Krrish 3 is a 2013 Indian Hindi-language superhero film produced and directed by Rakesh Roshan, and written by Honey Irani and Robin Bhatt. It is the third film in the Krrish series, following Koi... Mil Gaya (2003) and Krrish (2006). The film stars Hrithik Roshan, Vivek Oberoi, Priyanka Chopra and Kangana Ranaut in the lead roles. The story follows the life of Rohit Mehra, a scientist, and Krishna Mehra, a.k.a. Krrish, his superhero son, who face an elaborate conspiracy orchestrated by the evil genius Kaal and his female henchman Kaya. In the process, Krishna's pregnant wife Priya is kidnapped by Kaal and the form-changing Kaya takes her place at the Mehra home and eventually falls in love with Krishna.

Krrish 3 was initially scheduled to release as a 3D film. However, due to lack of time to convert the film to 3D, director Rakesh Roshan mentioned that the film will be released only in the 2D format. Krrish 3 released worldwide on 1 November 2013. Produced on a budget of ‚Çπ950 million (US$20 million),[3] the film grossed ‚Çπ3.93 billion (US$50 million) worldwide. It has received generally positive reviews,[9] with praise for Roshan and Ranaut's performances, the visual effects, the cinematography, and entertainment value, but with criticism of the music by Rajesh Roshan, the story, and the screenplay.fane madeTrailer

Mil Gaya (2003) and Krrish (2006). The film stars Hrithik Roshan, Vivek Oberoi, Priyanka Chopra and Kangana Ranaut in the lead roles. The story follows the life of Rohit Mehra, a scientist, and Krishna Mehra, a.k.a. Krrish, his superhero son, who face an elaborate conspiracy orchestrated by the evil genius Kaal and his female henchman Kaya. In the process, Krishna's pregnant wife Priya is kidnapped by Kaal and the form-changing Kaya takes her place at the Mehra home and eventually falls in love with Krishna.

description:

Aksar bollywood ke heartthrobs, limelight me bane rehte hai...ya to apni aane wali filmo ko lekarya phir kisi controversy ke wajahse...well aapko bata de ki sirf bollywood actors hi nahi balki kai baar unki wifes bhi galtiya kar baithti hai jis wajah se wo charche ka vishay ban jaati hai...aaiye aaj aisehi star wives ki baat karte hai

Number 1 : gauri khan

King khan ki better half ek successful interior designer hai aurproducer bhi...par gauri khan ek baar limelight me aayi thi saari galat reasons ke wajah se...jab shahrukh aur peecee ke affairs ke charche har kisi ke zubaan par the, tab gauri ne apne friends ke sathmilkar priyanka ko industry se bban karne ka socha...gauri ne to srk ko divorce tak ki dhamki de di thi aur kaha tha ki wo ab peecee ke sath film me kaam nahi karenge...

Number 2 : mira rajput

Shahid kapoor ki dharampatni mirarajput ko kaafi backlash ka saamna karna pada jabwo ek magazinecover par feature hui thi...logo ne sawaal uthaya kiaakhir unhone aisa kya achieve kiya hai jo unhe is magazine cover parfeature karne ka mauka mila...infact unhe to kaafi troll kiya gayatha jabunhone nepotism ke khilaafawaaz uthaayi thi, jabki wo khud bhi ek itne bade magazine ke cover par feature hui sirf shahid kapoor ki patni hone ke wajah se.

Number 3 : twinkle khanna

Akshay ki writer producer wife ek baararrest ho gayi thi ek bahut badi controversy ke chalte.2009 me lakme fashion week ke dauraan, akshay ramp par walk karte karte twinkle ke paas aaye jo firstrow me baithi thi aur unhe pne jeans ko unbutton karne ke liye kaha. Twinkle khanna ne jab aisa kiya to kai logo ko ye kaafi vulgar laga aur unke khilaafek case file kiyagaya...twinkel arrest hui thi par phir baad me ek bhaari fine dekar unhe release kiya gaya.

Number4 : kiranrao

Saal 2015 me bollywood ke mr prfectionist aamir aur unki wife kiran ke khilaafek fir file kiya gaya tha...ye fir isliyefile kiyagaya tha kyuki unhone india se shifthone ki baatkardithi ye kehkarki ye desh me kaafi intolerance hai.

Number 5 : malaikaarora khan

Arbaaz khan ki ex wifemalaika arora khan headlines me aayi thi apne divorce ke waqt...aisi khabreinthi ki malaika ne arbaaz ko paiso ke liye chod diya...lekin baad me malaika ne in khabron ko jhuthla diyaye kehkar ki unka divorce ek mutual decision tha...darasal unka divorce malaika ke arjun kapoor ke sath hue extra marital affair ke waja se hua.

title: Bachchan Family Forcing Aishwarya to Take Another Baby ?
description:
Abhishek Bachchan Wanted Two Kids with Aishwarya Rai. Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai‚Äôs pair is one of the most powerful couples in B Town. This couple looks very happy whenever they are in public but looks like there are not that much happy in real life. Let us find out in the video, what made the couple has differences in their conjugal life. After having controversial relationships with actors like Salman Khan and Vivek Oberoi, Aishwarya decided to get married. Beauty queen Aishwarya got married with Abhishek on 20th of April, in the year 2007. The couple welcomed their first child, their daughter Aradhya, in the year 2011. Aradhya is the apple of the eye of the Bachchan family. She is her grandparents‚Äô favourite. Big B loves her granddaughter, Aradhya a lot and he always pampers her too much. Abhishek also loves her little daughter a lot and he even gifted her an expensive car on her first birthday. But in spite of being happy, Abhishek and Aishwarya had a fall out among them because of their family planning. Well, Abhishek has always expressed that he wanted to have two kids. In an old video of the actor, Abhishek was seen saying that he wants to have two kids. When he was asked the reason, the actor replied that he himself grew up with his sibling, Shweta Bachcchan.  That is why he also wants his kids to be grown up with sibling. But Bollywood actress Aishwarya is not interested in having two babies. She is happy with their one and only daughter. Because of this, the two stars had a huge fall out. Aishwarya does not want to be a mother again. As per the reports, Aishwarya Rai is very much concerned about her looks and physical appearance. She wants to pursue her Bollywood career just like before but if she becomes pregnant then it would not be possible for her to continue acting. According to sources, close to the Bachchan family revealed that Aishwarya said that she has worked really hard to get in shape post pregnancy. It would be tough for her to that again. So she does not want a second child. Aishwarya also added that, their daughter Aradhya always gets trolled by people, which is another reason for her decision. Reports suggested that, this decision of Aishwarya has offended her mother and father in law. Big B and Jaya Bachchan both wanted to have another grandchild in their life just like their son‚Äôs wish. But because of Aishwarya‚Äôs decision, it would be impossible for them to see their wish getting fulfilled. Jaya Bachchan, because of this decision of Aishwarya, is really disappointed on her. Shweta Bachchan also does not like the decision of her sister in law. This is also one of the reasons of why Jaya and Shweta share cold relationship with Aishwarya.

title: Shocking Prediction For Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli Baby Girl
description:
Astrologer Predicted Virat & Anushka's Baby. A shocking news has recently come out that an astrologer had already predicted about the arrival of Virat & Anushka‚Äôs baby. Yes, popular entertainment new portal, Pinkvilla, has recently published an article about the astrologer,writing about this. Who is this astrologer? What did he actually predict back then? How was their reaction after his prediction?  Let us find out all these details about the astrologer and his prediction, in this video. According to the reports of Pinkvilla, Astro numerologist, Sanjay B Jumaani is the man, who made the prediction. Just like many people, Anushka Sharma‚Äôs mother is a believer of numerology and she went to Sanjay B Jumaani. According to the interview, given by Sanjay B Jumaani, Anushka‚Äôs mother, Ashima Sharma went to him regarding something else. But Sanjay B Jumaani craftily told her that as per numbers, his daughter Anushka and son in law, Virat, are going to be parents soon. Hearing this, Anushka Sharma‚Äôs mother laughed and clarified that Anushka and Virat does not have such plans. She also told Sanjay B Jumaani that Virat and Anushka, both are currently career driven and do not have any plans for kid. Sanjay B Jumaani explained to Anushka‚Äôs mother that both Anushka and Virat would be in their favourable periods. The reports are also suggesting that Sanjay B Jumaani even predicted the birth date of Virat and Anushka‚Äôs daughter. title: Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt Wedding is Really Cancelled ?
description:
Ranbir Kapoor Has Finally Revealed His &Alia‚Äôs Wedding Date. Bollywood‚Äôs chocolate boy and extremely talented actor Ranbir Kapoor, has finally opened up about his marriage. Well, the reports are suggesting that the actor has even revealed their wedding date too. Let us find out the details about Ranbir Kapoor and Alia‚Äôs wedding date and other secrets. Handsome Bollywood actor Ranbir Kapoor recently gave an interview to film critic Rajeev Masand. During this interview, Ranbir Kapoor was found in a very candid mood and he talked about everything during the interview. Ranbir Kapoor has spilled some beans on his wedding, which is currently the most anticipated wedding in B town. Well, the actor has revealed that if there was not any pandemic right now, he would have been married to Alia already. Yes, it clearly means that the wedding date that they fixed previously, prior to the pandemic, was really in December. But because of the pandemic, both the stars and their families have decided to postpone the idea of their wedding little bit. Later, Rajeev Masand asked the actor about what is the actual date, when Alia and Ranbir will be tying the knots. The actor said that he does not want to make it jinxed by revealing it now but he has left all his fans with a hint. Yes, Ranbir Kapoor has given a hint with his statement. He added that he will be tick marking his goal to get married, very soon. Yes, according to the actor‚Äôs statement, Ranbir and Alia will be getting married very soon, to each other. There are even some conjectures doing round on the internet that both the families have decided Umaid Bhawan as the venue. Yes, the same Umaid Bhawan, where Priyanka Chopra held her lavish wedding ceremony, with Nick Jonas. If the speculations are to be believed then Ranbir and Alia might get married in January, 2021. Recently they have even finished the work of their new apartment where they would stay after their marriage. The apartment is at same building, but different floors, where Ranbir Kapoor is currently living.

description:
Mr. India is a 1987 Indian Hindi-language superhero film directed by Shekhar Kapur, based on a screenplay written by Salim‚ÄìJaved. It stars Sridevi and Anil Kapoor in the lead roles. Amrish Puri, Ashok Kumar, Satish Kaushik, Ajit Vachani and Sharat Saxena are featured in supporting roles.

The film was the Highest-grossing Indian film of 1987 and remains a cult classic in India.[4] The film was known for several of its lines and songs, including Sridevi's "Miss Hawa Hawaii" performance, and Amrish Puri's quote "Mogambo khush hua" 

Zee Studios had announced that they have signed Ali Abbas Zafar to helm a trilogy: Mr India, based on the 1987 Shekhar Kapur-directed movie, which featured Anil Kapoor as Mr India and late Sridevi as a journalist. Ever since the announcement of the Mr India reboot has been made official by the makers, Shekhar has been up and about expressing his displeasure over the project. Now, when speculations are rife that Shah Rukh Khan had done a test shoot for the iconic role of Mogambo in Mr India reboot, Shekhar has hit back on Twitter again saying that he does not believe that anyone can take on the iconic role of the villain essayed by late Amrish Puri in the original film.

#MrIndia2 #ShahrukhKhan #JhanviKapoor #RanveerSingh  #Bollygrad #DrRamendraChakarwarti

title: Shocking Sad News For Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor Marriage
description:
All Is Not Well Between Alia & Ranbir. One of the most anticipated marriages of this year is the marriage of Alia and Ranbir. But looks like, everything is not well between these love birds. Well recently there were reports doing rounds that Ranbir and Alia will get married after the release of their first movie together Brahmastra. The reports suggested that their family members have already invited their relatives and told them to be free on those dates. It is also said that, both the families have started preparing for the marriage. Reports also said that Alia has already ordered her lehenga to Sabhyasachi. There were also reports suggesting that they have selected their honeymoon destination. But just after few days of these reports coming in limelight, news also started doing round that everything is not well between these two love birds. Both these stars have finished filming for Brahmastra and currently they are busy with their next projects. Alia is currently shooting for Sanjay Leela Bhansali‚Äôs Gangubai Kathiawadi and Ranbir has started shooting for his next movie Shamshera. It is also said that both these stars are also shooting their respective films at the same film studio but the sets are different. But what is surprising that they are not meeting each other, in spite of being at the same studio. This incident is quite surprising because Alia and Ranbir always accompany each other wherever they go. Even Alia accompanied Ranbir, when he visited his ill father Rishi Kapoor at a hospital of New Delhi. They even attended Armaan Jain‚Äôs wedding together and Alia was many times spotted with Ranbir‚Äôs mother Neetu Kapoor too. But what happened now that they are maintaining distance from each other? There are many questions coming in the limelight right now that if Ranbir has dumped Alia or if Alia cheated on Ranbir. Many people are also thinking that their relationship was just a publicity stunt. They were pretending to be in a relationship just to promote the business of their movie. But nothing has been confirmed now from their side. Many people are also assuming that they are keeping their personal and professional life separate.And by being professional they are not meeting each other on the sets of their movies.We hope that this adorable couple does not part their ways.

title: Baaghi 3 Trailer | Tiger Shroff | Shraddha kapoor | Nora Fatehi | Riteish D | Baaghi 3 Details 2020
description:
Baaghi 3 Full Movie Trailer New Songs Tiger Shroff Shraddha kapoor | Ahmed Khan | Upcoming Movie 2020

#Baaghi3 #Baaghi3Trailer #Baaghi3TigerShroff #Baaghi3ShraddhaKapoor #TigerShroffShraddhakapoor #FreakinMusicEntertainment #baaghi3Norafatehi #ItemSong #RiteishDeshmukh

Baaghi 3 is an upcoming Indian action thriller film directed by Ahmed Khan. Produced by Sajid Nadiadwala under Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment and distributed by Fox Star Studios, it is a spiritual sequel to Baaghi (2016) and Baaghi 2 (2018). Baaghi 3 stars Tiger Shroff, Riteish Deshmukh and Shraddha Kapoor. It is an official remake of 2012 Tamil film Vettai. Shraddha Kapoor is playing the role of an air hostess in the movie.

Principal photography of the film began on 12 September 2019 in Mumbai.It is scheduled to be theatrically released in cinemas on 6 March 2020.

The film was announced on 19 December 2018 with Tiger Shroff by Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment on their Twitter account by releasing a teaser poster. On 12 February 2019 Shraddha Kapoor was signed to play lead opposite Tiger Shroff. In June it was announced that Riteish Deshmukh has joined the cast of the film. In August 2019, it was announced that shooting of the film will take place in Morocco, Egypt, Serbia and Turkey.

The first schedule of filming began on 12 September in Mumbai and wrapped in early-October 2019. In late-September, Ankita Lokhande was added on the cast as Kapoor's sister.

title: Robot 3.0 | 31 Interesting Facts  | Rajinikanth | Disha Patani | Aishwarya | Amy Jackson | S.Shankar
description:
#RajiniKanth #TigerShroff #Robot3

Director Shankar's dream project 2.0 is all geared up to hit the theatres worldwide on November 29. The sci-fi film is a sequel to the director's Endhiran, which released in 2010. 

The trailer launch of 2.0 took place at a private theatre in Chennai. At the event, host RJ Balaji asked Shankar whether there might be a sequel to 2.0.

The director revealed, "3.0 might come in future. I have a few fresh ideas for 2.0's sequel. If I am able to pen down a worthy script, then there might be a 3.0 for sure. Let's see."

Shankar also promised that there are plenty of surprises in 2.0. "In the film, you will watch Rajinikanth as Vaseegaran, Chitti, 2.0 and even as giant Chitti. There are more surprises in the film," he revealed.

2.0 stars Rajinikanth, Akshay Kumar and Amy Jackson in the lead roles.2.0, the Rajinikanth movie, as the name suggests is packed with entertainment. Rajinikanth has a mild entrance scene in 2.0 but he more than makes it up with some whistle and clap-worthy sequences. He does what he does best by thoroughly entertaining the audiences. The film rekindles his flamboyant style. Amy Jackson plays a female humanoid robot. Her USP is that she is learning about what modern humans do, especially some funny references to film and TV. Akshay Kumar delivers an ultimate performance as the saviour of his Avian friends.

Robot 3.0 Trailer | Rajinikanth | Tiger Shroff | Katrina Kaif | Arnold Schwarzenegger

However, the 3.0 version of Chitti, the robot, is catching the eyes of the audience. These tiny Thalaivar microbots are winning hearts all over, The Indian Express reported.

title: Sanju | 31 Interesting facts | Ranbir Kapoor | Rajkumar Hirani | Releasing on 29th June
description:
Sanju  2 | 21 Interesting facts | Ranbir Kapoor | Rajkumar Hirani | Releasing on 29th June
Few lives in our times are as dramatic and enigmatic as the saga of Sanjay Dutt. Coming from a family of cinema legends, he himself became a film star, and then saw dizzying heights and darkest depths: adulation of die-hard fans, unending battles with various addictions, brushes with the underworld, prison terms, loss of loved ones, and the haunting speculation that he might or might not be a terrorist.

Sanju is a hilarious and heartbreaking exploration of one man‚Äôs battle against his own wild self and the formidable external forces trying to crush him. It depicts the journey of a man through everything that life can throw at him. Some true stories leave you thinking ‚Äúdid this really happen?‚Äù This is one such unbelievable story that happens to be true.

Starring: Ranbir Kapoor, Paresh Rawal, Manisha Koirala, Anushka Sharma, Sonam Kapoor, Dia Mirza, Vicky Kaushal, Jim Sarbh and Boman Irani.

title: Andaaz Apna Apna 2 | 41  Interesting Facts | Aamir Khan|  Salman Khan | Rajkumar Santoshi
description:
Andaaz Apna Apna 2 | 101  Interesting Facts | Aamir Khan|  Salman Khan | Rajkumar Santoshi
Andaz Apna Apna (translation: Everyone has their own style) is a 1994 Indian Hindi-language comedy film directed by Rajkumar Santoshi, starring Aamir Khan, Salman Khan, Raveena Tandon, Karisma Kapoor and Paresh Rawal in the lead roles. Mehmood, Govinda and Juhi Chawla make guest appearances. The film was released on 4 November 1994. The plot elements of this movie were later used in other language movies such as Ullathai Allitha (1996), Veedevadandi Babu (1997) and Galate Aliyandru (2000), though none being a frame to frame remake. The film was an average grosser at the box office, but has since emerged as a cult film over the years.

Directed by Rakesh Roshan
Produced by Rakesh Roshan
Screenplay by Rakesh Roshan
Honey Irani
Robin Bhatt
Story by Rakesh Roshan
Starring Hrithik Roshan
Krrish 3 is a 2013 Indian Hindi-language superhero film produced and directed by Rakesh Roshan, and written by Honey Irani and Robin Bhatt. It is the third film in the Krrish series, following Koi... Mil Gaya (2003) and Krrish (2006). The film stars Hrithik Roshan, Vivek Oberoi, Priyanka Chopra and Kangana Ranaut in the lead roles. The story follows the life of Rohit Mehra, a scientist, and Krishna Mehra, a.k.a. Krrish, his superhero son, who face an elaborate conspiracy orchestrated by the evil genius Kaal and his female henchman Kaya. In the process, Krishna's pregnant wife Priya is kidnapped by Kaal and the form-changing Kaya takes her place at the Mehra home and eventually falls in love with Krishna.

Krrish 3 was initially scheduled to release as a 3D film. However, due to lack of time to convert the film to 3D, director Rakesh Roshan mentioned that the film will be released only in the 2D format. Krrish 3 released worldwide on 1 November 2013. Produced on a budget of ‚Çπ950 million (US$20 million),[3] the film grossed ‚Çπ3.93 billion (US$50 million) worldwide. It has received generally positive reviews,[9] with praise for Roshan and Ranaut's performances, the visual effects, the cinematography, and entertainment value, but with criticism of the music by Rajesh Roshan, the story, and the screenplay.fane madeTrailer

title: Golmaal 5 official trailer 2020, Ajay Devgan, Kajol, janhvi Kapoor, Tushar Kapoor ,Rohit Shetty,
description:
Golmaal 5 official trailer 2020, Ajay Devgan, Kajol, janhvi Kapoor, Tushar Kapoor ,Rohit Shetty, movie releasing date
#Golmal5#trailer



tital-golmaal 5 movie trailer.






 U So "Ajay Devgan" and "Rohit Shetty" have given many action-packed hits so far, but in the "Golmaal Series", they have also added a lot of action and comedy.


  So far, 4 parts of this series have been released and all four have proved to be a hit, which along with them, "Arshad Warsi", "Tusshar Kapoor", "Shreyas Talpade" and "Kunal Khemu" have also contributed a lot.  So after Golmaal 4, the demand for Golmaal 5 movie started among the audience, but till now nobody had said anything about its fifth sequel, but friends tell you that now your wait is over.  So "Rohit Shetty" is going to be coming soon with "Golmaal 5", so in today's video, we are going to give you all the information related to the Golmaal 5 movie, which will be the star cast, what will be the story and when will the film  Will come till



 If you also want to know all these things related to the sequel of the film, then stay with us till the end of this video and also you should not forget to like our video for this hit film sequel.



 The first film of the hit "Golmaal Film Series" from Bollywood hit director "Rohit Shetty" came in the year 2006 with "Ajay Devgan" with "Sharman Joshi", "Arshad Warsi" "Tusshar Kapoor" and  "Rimi Sen" was seen as the heroine.


 The film was a hit and the film grossed 46 crores, after which the second part came in the form of "Golmaal Returns" in 2008, this time with "Ajay Devgan" with "Sharman Joshi", "Arshad Warsi", "Tusshar Kapoor"  , "Shreyas Telpade" and "Kareena Kapoor", "Celina Jaitley" and "Anjana Sukhmi" starred as the heroine and the film proved to be a hit after earning 82 crores followed by "Golmaal 3" in the year 2010 film.  The third part of it came in which Ajay Devgan, "Mithun Chakraborty", Arshad Warsi Tusshar Kapoor, Kunal Khemu, Shreyas Telpade and "Kareena Kapoor" as the heroine were seen every time.  The film also proved to be a superhit, earning 169 crores.



  The trio hit the film in the year 2017 as "Golmaal Again" with the fourth part of the film starring Ajay Devgn, Arshad Warsi Tusshar Kapoor, Kunal Khemu Shreyas Telpade and "Tabu" and "Parineeti Chopra" as the heroine.


 The story of this film was a horror comedy which was liked by the people so much that the film proved to be a block buster by earning 311 crores, since which the audience is now eagerly waiting for "Golmaal 5".


  So friends, your wait is over because Rohit Shetty is going to bring Golmaal 5 soon to talk about the news of the film, so this time the story of the film will be very different from the rest of the part, you must have seen that the makers in every part  A new and most different story has been brought, in such a situation, the challenge was to bring a unique concept in front of the makers. After almost a year, they have now got the idea of ‚Äã‚Äãthe film, according to the reports, the story of the film has been finalized and now the makers dialogue and  We are working on the screen play but there is no information about what the story of the film will be.




 If we talk about the star cast of the film, like the rest of the film, the male cast of the film will remain Sam i.e. the main lead will have "Ajay Devgan", "Arshad Warsi" "Tusshar Kapoor", "Kunal Khemu", "Shreyas Telpade".  But like every time there will be a new heroine in the film, it is being told that "Kajol" and "Janhvi Kapoor" will be seen as lead heroine in Golmaal 5, while talking about the release date of the film, "Suryavanshi has been reported.  Soon after "Rohit Shetty will start work on" Golmaal 5 "The shooting of the film will start next year and it is speculated that the film will be released by the end of 2021, but as the circumstances are going on,  Do not think that would be possible.











 So friends, do you think that like the rest of the part, this film will be a hit, be a super hit or will be a blockbuster.


  You must tell us your comments by commenting in the comment box and you should not forget to subscribe to our channel to know the similar spicy news related to Bollywood.

Sonam Kapoor Is Pregnant. The fashionista of Bollywood, Sonam Kapoor has been married to Anand Ahuja. Sonam and Anand got married in a lavish wedding on 8th May, in the year 2018. The couple was at London but they recently returned from London because of the current situation around the world. Sonam Kapoor is maintain distance with everyone else because of the situation.Just like everyone she is at her home and she is not going outside. And recently her few Instagram posts caught attention. Looks like the fashionista of Bollywood is currently pregnant. Sonam recently posted a video of her while she was talking with her mother in law. In the video it is seen that the actress is maintaining social distance and was seen talking from the inside of her house. Sonam Kapoor was wearing a white shirt and pyjama in her house and it caught the eyes of everyone. It was Sonam‚Äôs baby bump that caught the eyes of the people. It was quite evident from the photo that the Bollywood actress is finally pregnant. After almost 2 years of her wedding with quite famous businessman Anand Ahuja, they are finally having baby. Her white shirt was quite loose still her baby bump was prominent in the video. Sonam also posted another picture of her on her social media. This picture confirmed the speculation around her pregnancy because her baby bump was also spotted in this image. According to sources, close to the Kapoor family, all the members are really happy currently. Anil Kapoor is too much excited and is ready to become a grandfather. All the members are excited and ready to welcome the new member of their family. Bollywood Bubble has already confirmed that the actress is pregnant. Also, sources closer to the actress, has revealed that both the families are too much happy now. title: Andaaz Apna Apna 2 | 101  Interesting Facts | Aamir Khan|  Salman Khan | Rajkumar Santoshi
description:
Andaaz Apna Apna 2 | 101  Interesting Facts | Aamir Khan|  Salman Khan | Rajkumar Santoshi
Andaz Apna Apna (translation: Everyone has their own style) is a 1994 Indian Hindi-language comedy film directed by Rajkumar Santoshi, starring Aamir Khan, Salman Khan, Raveena Tandon, Karisma Kapoor and Paresh Rawal in the lead roles. Mehmood, Govinda and Juhi Chawla make guest appearances. The film was released on 4 November 1994. The plot elements of this movie were later used in other language movies such as Ullathai Allitha (1996), Veedevadandi Babu (1997) and Galate Aliyandru (2000), though none being a frame to frame remake. The film was an average grosser at the box office, but has since emerged as a cult film over the years.
Directed by Rajkumar Santoshi

title: Go Goa Gone 2 Trailer | Saif Ali Khan | Kunal Khemu | Vir Das | Anand Tiwari
description:
Saif Ali Khan, Kunal Kemmu and Vir Das came to the big screen together to fight a bunch of zombies in 2013's Go Goa Gone. Now, the makers of the film have announced the sequel of the film. Go Goa Gone ended on an open note and the sequel will kick off from where the original film ended. The film was India's first zom-com.

The original film was directed by Indian American film directors Raj Nidimoru and Krishna DK. It also featured Saif Puja Gupta and Anand Tiwari in lead roles. It was produced by Saif Ali Khan, Dinesh Vijan and Sunil Lulla. The sequel will be produced by Dinesh Vijan.

#trailer#movie




Tittle - Bhool Bhulaiya 2, Official Trailer.




 Friends, you must have seen the film "Bhool Bhulaiyaa", which came in 2007,


 The film was a psychology comedy horror film which entertained the audience a lot with its horror scenes as well as its comedy scenes and due to which it proved to be a successful film,



 Even today, when this film is aired on TV, the number of people watching it is in millions,




 According to reports, the film directors are preparing to make the sequel of this film, yes we are going to see the film "Bhool Bhulaiya 2" soon,




 So in this video of our day, we are going to tell you about the film "Bhool Bhulaiya 2", who will be the starcast, what will be the story, and when the film will come,



  So if you also want to know all these things related to the film "Bhul Bhulaiya 2", stay tuned with us till the end of this video and also don't forget to like our video for this Bollywood industry superhit film.  !






 "Bhool Bhulaiyaa", aired on the big screen in 2007, was a comedy horror drama film, and was made under the direction of "Priyadarshan", the film "Siddharth Chaturvedi" became "Shiney Ahuja" and his wife "Avni".  Bani was based on "Vidya Balan", who ignores the warning given by the evil spirits, and meanwhile, inside Avni, the evil spirit named "Manjulika" is washed away.




 After which Avni does a number of strange incidents, and "Avni "'s husband" Siddharth Chaturvedi "calls Dr. Akshay Kumar, a psychiatrist turned" Akshay Kumar ", to find out the secret behind all this.  Let's try to know the truth,




  It was just that the story of the film was very much liked by the audience, as well as the unique look of Akshay Kumar in the film was well appreciated by the audience, and due to this it proved to be a successful film.




  According to reports, given the same feature of the film, the film director "Anees Bajmi" is going to be seen on the big screen with the sequel of this film,



 Yes, we are going to see the film "Bhool Bhulaiya 2" soon, and recently the first look of the film has been released, and in this poster, actor "Karthik Aryan" was seen wearing saffron colored kurta pajama.  Going, who has a trident in his hand,


 It is being told that the work on the script of this film has started, and the theme of the film is going to be a comedy horror as before, and this time the film will be presented as a recording of New Generation, as well as many in the film  Different types of twists and turns are also available.



  If we talk about the star cast of the film, then on one side, the actor "Karthik Aryan" is going to be seen playing the role of "Doctor Ishaan Shah", while his opposite actress "Kiara Advani" is playing the role of "Kritika Sharma".  As will be seen, actress "Tabu" is also going to play "Riya Anand" as the lead actress,



 But it is not yet revealed whether the film will be seen starring actor "Akshay Kumar", but the film has been officially announced, and the film will be released on the big screen on 31 July 2020.  Is about to



 Although the way Coronavirus has spread its legs across the country, it may be that the release date of this film may also be postponed,


 But ever since the audience got the news about this film, since then there has been a lot of craze among the audience about this film!







 So friends, do you want to see the actor "Akshay Kumar" acting in the film "Bhul Bhulaiya 2", or not, you must tell us your comments by commenting in the comment box and at the same time more such news related to Bollywood industry.  Do not forget to subscribe to our channel to watch!

LABEL: FAKE
title: Robot 3.0 Trailer | Rajinikanth | Tiger Shroff | Katrina Kaif | Arnold Schwarzenegger
description:
#RajiniKanth #TigerShroff #Robot3

Director Shankar's dream project 2.0 is all geared up to hit the theatres worldwide on November 29. The sci-fi film is a sequel to the director's Endhiran, which released in 2010. 

The trailer launch of 2.0 took place at a private theatre in Chennai. At the event, host RJ Balaji asked Shankar whether there might be a sequel to 2.0.

The director revealed, "3.0 might come in future. I have a few fresh ideas for 2.0's sequel. If I am able to pen down a worthy script, then there might be a 3.0 for sure. Let's see."

Shankar also promised that there are plenty of surprises in 2.0. "In the film, you will watch Rajinikanth as Vaseegaran, Chitti, 2.0 and even as giant Chitti. There are more surprises in the film," he revealed.

2.0 stars Rajinikanth, Akshay Kumar and Amy Jackson in the lead roles.2.0, the Rajinikanth movie, as the name suggests is packed with entertainment. Rajinikanth has a mild entrance scene in 2.0 but he more than makes it up with some whistle and clap-worthy sequences. He does what he does best by thoroughly entertaining the audiences. The film rekindles his flamboyant style. Amy Jackson plays a female humanoid robot. Her USP is that she is learning about what modern humans do, especially some funny references to film and TV. Akshay Kumar delivers an ultimate performance as the saviour of his Avian friends.

Robot 3.0 Trailer | Rajinikanth | Tiger Shroff | Katrina Kaif | Arnold Schwarzenegger

However, the 3.0 version of Chitti, the robot, is catching the eyes of the audience. These tiny Thalaivar microbots are winning hearts all over, The Indian Express reported.

Director Shankar's dream project 2.0 is all geared up to hit the theatres worldwide on November 29. The sci-fi film is a sequel to the director's Endhiran, which released in 2010. 

The trailer launch of 2.0 took place at a private theatre in Chennai. At the event, host RJ Balaji asked Shankar whether there might be a sequel to 2.0.

The director revealed, "3.0 might come in future. I have a few fresh ideas for 2.0's sequel. If I am able to pen down a worthy script, then there might be a 3.0 for sure. Let's see."

Shankar also promised that there are plenty of surprises in 2.0. "In the film, you will watch Rajinikanth as Vaseegaran, Chitti, 2.0 and even as giant Chitti. There are more surprises in the film," he revealed.

2.0 stars Rajinikanth, Akshay Kumar and Amy Jackson in the lead roles.2.0, the Rajinikanth movie, as the name suggests is packed with entertainment. Rajinikanth has a mild entrance scene in 2.0 but he more than makes it up with some whistle and clap-worthy sequences. He does what he does best by thoroughly entertaining the audiences. The film rekindles his flamboyant style. Amy Jackson plays a female humanoid robot. Her USP is that she is learning about what modern humans do, especially some funny references to film and TV. Akshay Kumar delivers an ultimate performance as the saviour of his Avian friends.

Robot 3.0 Trailer | Rajinikanth | Tiger Shroff | Katrina Kaif | Arnold Schwarzenegger

However, the 3.0 version of Chitti, the robot, is catching the eyes of the audience. These tiny Thalaivar microbots are winning hearts all over, The Indian Express reported.

Krrish 3 is a 2013 Indian Hindi-language superhero film produced and directed by Rakesh Roshan, and written by Honey Irani and Robin Bhatt. It is the third film in the Krrish series, following Koi... Mil Gaya (2003) and Krrish (2006). The film stars Hrithik Roshan, Vivek Oberoi, Priyanka Chopra and Kangana Ranaut in the lead roles. The story follows the life of Rohit Mehra, a scientist, and Krishna Mehra, a.k.a. Krrish, his superhero son, who face an elaborate conspiracy orchestrated by the evil genius Kaal and his female henchman Kaya. In the process, Krishna's pregnant wife Priya is kidnapped by Kaal and the form-changing Kaya takes her place at the Mehra home and eventually falls in love with Krishna.

Krrish 3 was initially scheduled to release as a 3D film. However, due to lack of time to convert the film to 3D, director Rakesh Roshan mentioned that the film will be released only in the 2D format. Krrish 3 released worldwide on 1 November 2013. Produced on a budget of ‚Çπ950 million (US$20 million), the film grossed ‚Çπ3.93 billion (US$50 million) worldwide. It has received generally positive reviews,with praise for Roshan and Ranaut's performances, the visual effects, the cinematography, and entertainment value, but with criticism of the music by Rajesh Roshan, the story, and the screenplay.

title: Bollywood Stars Career Destroyed By Karan Johar
description:
These are the Careers Of Bollywood Stars Destroyed By Karan Johar. Karan Johar is one of the most celebrated directors and producers of the film industry. He has launched many stars in Bollywood but most of them are star kids. So, he is given the title of ‚Äòflag bearer of nepotism‚Äô. Because of his fondness towards star kids only, Karan has tried to destroy the career of many Bollywood stars who are quite successful now.

1. Anushka Sharma :- Karan Johar himself admitted during a press conference with Rajeev Masand that KJo tried hard to sabotage Anushka‚Äôs career. Karan never wanted Aditya Chopra to cast Anushka Sharma in Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi. When Aditya showed him Anushka‚Äôs image, KJo rejected her. Karan hated Anushka‚Äôs look and hesitantly watched Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi but later he casted her in her movie Ae Dil Hai Mushkil.

2. Sushant Singh Rajput :- One of the extremely talented actors of Bollywood, Sushant Singh Rajput ‚Äòs career was also manipulated by Karan Johar. Because of Sushant‚Äôs fall out with a producer, many big production houses of Bollywood, including Karan Johar banned him. Which is why the actor lost all the projects in his hand and was left with no work; and he decided to take his own life.

3. Ayushmann Khurrana :- One of the most sought after actor of Bollywood. Ayushmann Khurrana was once neglected and rejected by Karan Johar. Ayushmann himself confessed that when he was hosting a show, he asked Karan for work. Karan gave him a landline number. When he called, a staff of Dharma Production said that they only work with stars and he would not get work there.

4. Priyanka Chopra :- Priyanka is a global icon now but there was a time when Karan Johar tried to ban Priyanka Chopra from Bollywood. Everybody knows about the Shah Rukh Khan‚Äôs affair with Priyanka Chopra which created a lot buzz in B Town. Gauri along with her friends from industry with help of Karan Johar decided to ban Priyanka in Bollywood but ultimately failed.

5. Kangana Ranaut :- Kangana is one of the most out spoken actresses in Bollywood and she has always blamed Karan for nepotism in industry. Kangana humiliated Karan Johar for showing attitude towards her and for nepotism, on Karan‚Äôs own talk show. Karan tried really hard to sabotage the shining career of Kangana Ranaut, but he failed to end the career of the ‚Äòqueen‚Äô.

title: why Divorce is Very Common in Kajol's Life
description:
Bollywood actress Kajol recently did a Netflix movie named Tribhanga, which also stars Mithila Palkar, Tanvi Azmi. The beautiful movie is a family drama with a little touch of humor. While doing promotions for the movie, during an interview, Kajol talked about her childhood and upbringing too. The actress during her interview, talked about how her childhood was even after the separation of her parents. The actress said that her childhood could have gone very wrong after the separation of her parents. Kajol was around just 4 years old when her mother Tanuja and her father, filmmaker Shomu Mukherjee, got separated. The actress has revealed that she had an amazing childhood in spite of her parents being separated. She feels very lucky as Kajol thinks that things could have went very wrong in her childhood because of the separation. Kajol could have a very disturbed childhood but it was nothing like that, rather she had an amazing one. The actress said that she had many friends who had their parents together but were having disturbed childhood. The actress also added during her interview that she loved her father separately and mother separately. And she also loved them together as well too and never felt any complication for their separation. Kajol even jokingly said that she tried many times to play her parents against each other. But the actress revealed that her parents, Tanuja and Shomu Mukherjee were too smart and evolved. Kajol made her digital debut recently with Netflix‚Äôs movie Tribhanga where her performance was spectacular.

LABEL: FAKE
title: Why Salman Khan Hate Amitabh Bachchan So Much
description:
Does the bhaijaan of Bollywood hate the veteran actor of Bollywood, Big B?Why this question? Because Salman Khan does not like to get compared with the veteran actor. The current reports are suggesting that Salman Khan gets very angry when someone compares him the bhaijaan. What had happened that Salman Khan gets angry whenever someone compares him Big B? Salman Khan‚Äôs style is very unique and no other star has the same kind of swag in this industry. His swag stands out from each and every other stars present in the B town which is why he cannot get compared with anyone. But when it comes to stardom, the Khans of Bollywood, has reached the extent when they can easily get compared with veteran actors. When Salman Khan was giving auditions for Sooraj Barjatiya‚Äôs Maine Pyaar Kiya, he did a small role in Biwi Ho Toh Aisi. When the first cut of the movie got ready, a member from the crew of Biwi Ho Toh Aisi told Salman Khan that he looked like Big B. Yes, Salman Khan received such a huge compliment during his initial days in the industry. Any other actor would have been overwhelmed with joy after that compliment, but not Salman Khan. Salman Khan was very much angry when he received such a compliment. The actor folded his hands and requested the crew member not to compare him with Mr, Amitabh Bachchan. But why did Salman Khan give such a reaction? Does he hate the veteran actor?Well, before any speculations, let us explain the real reason behind such a reaction of Salman Khan. At that time a compliment like getting compared with Amitabh Bachchan meant a lot but it was a huge responsibility too. People applauded many actors for their style like Amitabh Bachchan but when the same actor failed to act like Big B, their career got ruined. And Salman Khan did not want his career to get ruined at the very initial stage, which is why he hated to get compared with Big B. Salman Khan is ready to get called the competitor of any other star but he hates being compared with Salman Khan.

LABEL: FAKE
title: Another Sad News For Salman Khan and His Fans
description:
Salman Khan Exempted To Appear in Court. During the shooting of Hum Saath Saath Hain, few stars of the film got accused of hunting black buck in 1998. The other stars who were accused in this case have been acquitted by the court. But it the bhaijaan of Bollywood who had to go through the trials in the court. Salman Khan was even sentenced for five years imprisonment by a trial court in March, 2018 while other stars were acquitted from the case. The actor had challenged the sentence ordered by the trial court and this case has been still going on. Recently Salman Khan has again made headlines regarding his black buck poaching case. But what has happened now? Let us find out the details in this video. Salman Khan was asked by the district and sessions court of Jodhpur, Rajasthan to appear on 16th of January. This summon was regarding the hearing of a petition of the actor challenging his sentence of five years. But due to the ongoing pandemic, the actor has decided to take some time and decided to delay the process. On 16th of January, the actor submitted an application to the court, seeking exemption from appearance because of current situation. The counsel of Salman has said that the application was submitted because of the possible risk to Salman Khan‚Äôs safety due to traveling. Well, there is a good news as the session judge has granted the permission to Salman Khan. But the session judge has exempted Salman Khan from just appearing on 16th of January but has given a new date. The session judge has ordered Salman Khan to appear in front of court for the hearing on 6th of February, regarding his challenge. Even, Salman Khan has missed previous hearing of this case which was held on December 1st. Citing the pandemic as the reason o his absence, it will be 17th time that Salman Khan would be missing from hearing. Since the case has shifted to the sessions court, in April, 2018, Salman Khan has missed 16 hearings already.

When 6 lovers are parted because of an evil conspiracy and revenge in the era of 1419, they cross paths once again in 2019. However, in the present life the 3 boys fall in love with the wrong women and are about to marry their sisters-in-law. As destiny would have it history repeats itself when the 3 couples land up in Sitamgarh once again, where it all began. Will they remember their past lives in time for marriage or will they be stuck with the wrong lovers forever? Housefull 4 is coming to confuse you, put you on a laughing riot and take you through the grandeur of 1419 with a spark of 2019. Come & witness this Epic Reincarnation Comedy. #Housefull4

Akshay Kumar as Bala & Harry
Riteish Deshmukh as Bangdu Maharaj & Roy
Bobby Deol as Dharamputra & Max
Kriti Sanon as Rajkumari Madhu & Kriti
Pooja Hegde as Rajkumari Mala & Pooja
Kriti Kharbanda as Rajkumari Meena & Neha

A Sajid Nadiadwala Franchise

Directed by Farhad Samji

Produced by Sajid Nadiadwala

Presented & Co produced by Fox Star Studios

A Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment production

Music on T-series

Based on the real life story of the brave-heart flight attendant Neerja Bhanot, this biopic has Sonam Kapoor playing Neerja. The film has been directed by Ram Madhvani and has been produced by Fox Star Studios and Bling Unplugged.

It is the courageous story of a 23 year old girl - youngest ever Ashok Chakra winner - who lost her life while saving passengers from terrorists on board, the hijacked Pan Am Flight 73 on 5th September 1986. Released in theatres on 19th February 2016.

LABEL: REAL
title: Neha Dhupia Talks About Mental Health and Abuse | Neha Dhupia Interview | Filmfare Exclusive
description:
After Lust Stories and Devi, Neha Dhupia is back with yet another relevant and gut-wrenching short film. Co-producing the film Step Out, Neha returns to the screen as an actor after a long time and she is doubly excited for this one. 

Based on mental health and abuse, Step Out takes a nosedive into the relationship of an unemployed artiste and his therapist. With a simple yet beautiful message that is more relevant during the pandemic than ever before, Neha spoke of how important it is to have a dialogue about the issues and consequences of mental problems.

Talking about her association with the short film format, Neha also added that the cause is beyond the film and needs to be talked about openly and regularly. Catch her in this exclusive char with Filmfare now. 

#NehaDhupia #FilmfareExclusive

title: Behind the Scenes with Vidya Balan | Vidya Balan Photoshoot | Filmfare Cover Shoot
description:
With the break of the pandemic and the lockdown in place, shooting had completely halted for almost five months. Breaking free from home-quarantine, out latest cover star shot her cover with Filmfare amidst the lockdown, following all the norms and rules of social distancing. 

Casual, cheerful and chic, Vidya Balan wooed the lenses for Filmfare September cover in the most candid and natural way possible. Capturing her moods, photographer Pavitr Saith brought out the most childlike quality in Vidya for her cover shoot. Styled by Pranay Jaitly and Shounak Amonkar, Vidya donned the laid back colour of the fall in flowy gowns, co-ords and dresses as she went from retro chic to millennial diva in. Her natural habitat. 

Taking you behind the scenes of our latest cover shoot, we bring to you Vidya Balan in her most unfiltered and cheerful mood ever. She‚Äôs hopping around, laughing her heart out and making this shoot one of the breeziest every. Take a look‚Ä¶

title: 10 Minutes of Happiness with Sonam Kapoor | Sonam Kapoor Interview | Filmfare Exclusive
description:
Sonam Kapoor is one actress who‚Äôs been living out of her suitcase for a while now. While her in-laws stay in Delhi, her husband Anand Ahuja and she own a house in London and her family is in Mumbai. Hopping from one city to another, Sonam finally found a halt when the lockdown was initiated in the country. After spending 3 months in Delhi, Sonam flew down to Mumbai last month. 

In today‚Äôs episode of 10 Minutes of Happiness, Digital Editor Rahul Gangwani finds out what Sonam Kapoor has been upto while at home. She revealed that her mother-in-law, just like her loves to dress up and both of them would make it a point to put on their best clothes once in a while at home. While in Mumbai, it‚Äôs a madhouse at the Kapoor household. Lead by the super strict Sunita Kapoor who is making sure her family is cautious, Anil Kapoor is busy working on his muscles. So much and more, Sonam Kapoor spills the beans on the riot that the Kapoors make at home everyday. Watch the fun episode now.

title: 10 Minutes of Happiness with Siddhant Chaturvedi | Siddhant Chaturvedi Interview | Filmfare
description:
Siddhant Chaturvedi made his big debut last year with Zoya Akhtar‚Äôs Gully Boy. Being popularly known by your character is something actors dream of and this young star gave the country MC Sher with just one film. A brilliant actor, Siddhant is also a passionate musician and has released his first ever single during the lockdown, titled Dhoop. 

Catching up with him, Digital Editor Rahul Gangwani spoke to Siddhant about what‚Äôs keeping up and up and going while he is under self-quarantining at home. Living with parents and his brother, Siddhant revealed he has a constantly buzzing life even at home and is spending some quality time with his father, watching old Bollywood films. title: Preity Zinta‚Äôs Filmfare Award Winning Speeches | Best Filmfare Award Moments | Filmfare Official
description:
Preity Zinta was one of the most loved actresses of the 2000s. The dimpled beauty made her acting debut in the year 1998, with Dil Se opposite Shah Rukh Khan followed by Soldier opposite Bobby Deol in the same year. She fetched the Filmfare Award for Best Female Debut for the same. The actress over time has given some brilliant performances. She came to the forefront with a role of a teenage single mother in Kya Kehna and broke all the norms of a conventional heroine.

She featured in some blockbuster movies like Dil Chahta Hai, Koi... Mil Gaya and The Hero: Love Story of a Spy but what won her the Best Actress Award was her role as Naina, in Karan Johar‚Äôs Kal Ho Naa Ho. Her role as a young girl, who is heartbroken in love, won her a lot of accolades from both the fans and the critics. Bubbly, outspoken and beautiful is how we would describe this extraordinary actress. As she celebrates her birthday today, we look back at her winning moments with Filmfare.

#PreityZintaBirthday #PreityZinta #FilmfareAwards

LABEL: REAL
title: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan‚Äôs Filmfare Award Winning Speeches | Filmfare Awards | Birthday Special
description:
Aishwarya Rai, as goes her maiden name, paved her path to success the day she won the 1994 Miss World pageant. From that moment onwards, there was no turning back for this beauty. Regarded as the ‚Äúmost beautiful woman in the world‚Äù, Aishwarya became the queen of hearts within just a few years. 

She started her career as an actor in 1997 with Mani Ratnam‚Äôs Iruvar and did her first Hindi film, Aur Pyar Ho Gaya the same year. She went on to do several films in the next couple of years but her stroke to stardom came in 1999 with Sanjay Leela Bhansali‚Äôs Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam. Paired opposite superstars Salman Khan and Ajay Devgn, Aishwarya‚Äôs character Nandini struck several chords with the women of the time. She was naive yet fierce, strong but bound by the constitution of marriage, Aishwarya won her first Filmfare Award for her accurate portrayal of a woman in love. 

Her femininity and grace is known all over the globe. She‚Äôs an epitome of beauty and transcends her elegance even on screen. Taking the screen once again in a big way as Paro from Devdas in 2002, Aishwarya proved that her beauty maybe be paramount but her talent is exponentially bigger. She was awarded the Black Lady for her act in Bhansali‚Äôs drama yet again for her iconic role Paro. 

Aishwarya went on to do some brilliant roles thereafter. Films like Raincoat, Jodha Akbar and Raavan were some class acts by the superstar. But ruling over just Bollywood wasn‚Äôt enough for her. Aishwarya aced her act in several Hollywood films like Pink Panther 2, The Last Legion, and Mistress of Spices. 

Married to the junior Bachchan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan is now one of the biggest names in not just in the film industries but also the fashion world across the globe. A larger-than-life career, global domination and the most loved family woman, Aishwarya is an inspiration for all. 

As the actress turns 46 today, we take a look back at two of her most cherished Filmfare moments... her winning speeches for both her Best Actress Awards. 

#AishwaryaRaiBachchan #HappyBirthdayAishwarya #AishwaryaRaiBachchanFilmfare

LABEL: REAL
title: Dia Mirza, Vaibhav Rekhi tie the knot; actor distributes sweets to paparazzi
description: Dia Mirza & Vaibhav Rekhi got married at her home in Mumbai on February 15. After the wedding, both Dia and Vaibhav posed for the paparazzi. Dia was seen in a gorgeous red saree with a large golden necklace and green bangles. Vaibhav also looked dapper in his white wedding outfit and a golden saafa (turban). Dia also distributed sweets to the paparazzi gathered outside her home. Pictures from the wedding were also shared by Dia and Vaibhav's friends on social media. The ‚ÄòRehna Hai Tere Dil Mein‚Äô actor was in a relationship with Vaibhav Rekhi for some time, but the couple never went public with their romance. Watch the full video for more.

LABEL: REAL
title: Watch: Sonu Sood distributes e-rickshaws to needy in hometown Moga
description:
Actor Sonu Sood yet another time came forward to help the needy amid Covid-19 pandemic. Sood distributed e-rickshaws to the needy people in Punjab‚Äôs Moga. The actor, who hails from Moga, handed over the e-rickshaws to as many as eight people. ‚ÄúWe are distributing e-rickshaws so that the needy people can earn their living. This is my small contribution from my end to help those who are in need. We are distributing e-rickshaws to needy people across the country,‚Äù Sood said. Speaking on the ongoing farmers‚Äô stir, the actor said, ‚ÄúI really hope that the government and farmers find a solution to the issue soon.‚Äù

title: Watch: Sunny Leone celebrates sons' 3rd birthday, shares cutest family photos
description:
Actor Sunny Leone is the happiest mother as her twin sons, Noah and Asher, turned three on Thursday. She took to Instagram to share few cute family photos. The photos show Sunny and her husband Daniel surrounded by the boys and their big sister, Nisha. The children are all in swimming costumes and wearing birthday party hats. More photos show Nisha, in a floral dress, attacking her baby brother with a water hose and Sunny attacking Daniel too. All three kids posed on a flight of stairs and the boys cut a yummy birthday cake as well. Sunny adopted Nisha in 2017 while the boys were born through surrogacy in 2018. Sunny often shares adorable photos and videos of her family with her followers on Instagram.

LABEL: REAL
title: Rajiv Kapoor dies due to heart attack, cremated in Mumbai; tributes pour in
description: Family, friends, and prominent Bollywood personalities bid adieu to actor-director Rajiv Kapoor, son of celebrated filmmaker-actor Raj Kapoor, as he was cremated here on Tuesday evening. Rajiv Kapoor, the youngest among three brothers and two sisters - Randhir Kapoor, Rishi Kapoor, Ritu Nanda, and Rima Jain, died in the afternoon following a heart attack. He was 58. Rajiv Kapoor, known for films like "Ram Teri Ganga Maili" and "Lover Boy", was cremated in Chembur, a suburb in eastern Mumbai, around 7 pm. Randhir Kapoor and nephew, actor Ranbir Kapoor led the funeral procession. Family and close friends from the film industry were also seen at Rajiv Kapoor's Chembur bungalow to pay their last respects. Watch the full video for more details.

LABEL: REAL
title: Kunal Kemmu on web censorship: Free speech doesn't mean you can offend people
description: Bollywood actor Kunal Kemmu speaks to HT City Entertainment Editor, Monika Rawal, about having a "bittersweet" 2020 that gave him an opportunity to put some of his best work forth including Malang, Lootcase and web series Abhay 2. He admits he was somewhere getting in this rut where he was only getting comedies, and "so when Kalank, Abhay and Malang a came my way, I was very excited." Kunal also shares his views on the burning topic of web censorship and those who exploit freedom of speech. Having started acting as a child actor in Hum Hain Rahi Pyaar Ke (1993), the actor would be completing 30 years of being in Bollywood. Looking back, he says things were very different back then when there was no box office pressure or paparazzi culture. He further shares how spending time with his daughter Inaaya was the best part about the lockdown and as a parent, his take on this whole pap culture and star kids being in constant limelight.

LABEL: REAL
title: Taapsee Pannu, Sonakshi mock identical tweets by B-town celebs on farmers‚Äô stir
description:
Rihanna‚Äôs tweet drawing attention to farmers‚Äô stir has divided Bollywood. Moments after Indian government responded to tweets by global celebs, Several top Bollywood stars posted similar tweets on their accounts. These tweets warned against ‚Äòfalse propaganda‚Äô and supported an ‚Äòamicable resolution‚Äô. Some actors have now mocked the similarly worded tweets by their colleagues. Farmers have been protesting against three farm laws for over two months now. The government has agreed to amend some provisions; farmers want withdrawal of laws. Several rounds of talks have failed to resolve the deadlock.

When alien invaders kidnap Earth's superheroes, their kids are whisked away to a government safe house. But whip-smart tween Missy Moreno (Yaya Gosselin) will stop at nothing to rescue her superhero dad, Marcus Moreno (Pedro Pascal). 

Missy teams up with the rest of the superkids to escape their mysterious government babysitter, Ms. Granada (Priyanka Chopra Jonas). If they're going to save their parents, they'll have to work together by using their individual powers ‚Äî from elasticity to time control to predicting the future ‚Äî and form an out-of-this-world team. Full of action and heart, WE CAN BE HEROES is directed by Robert Rodriguez (SPY KIDS, THE ADVENTURES OF SHARKBOY AND LAVAGIRL) and also stars Boyd Holbrook, Christian Slater, Chris McDonald, and Adriana Barraza.

description:
Wishing you a very Happy Rose Day! Let's communicate unspoken wishes and feelings by exchanging roses today. Here are some movie recommendation for you to celebrate rose day with your beloved. 

‚ñ∫Kal Ho Na Ho

Directors: Nikkhil Advani
Starring: Shah Rukh Khan, Preity Zinta, Saif Ali Khan

Naina Kapur is a beautiful introvert and often keeps to herself. Her life soon changes, when she befriends her neighbour, Aman Mathur, who is jaunty and bubbly. Naina falls in love with Aman and decides to confess her love to him. She is heart-broken, when she finds out that Aman is married. But the truth unravels, and Aman has lied about being married. His lie hides a dark secret.

‚ñ∫Kuch Kuch Hota Hai

Directors: Karan Johar
Starring: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Rani Mukerji

'Kuch Kuch Hota Hai' is a Bollywood blockbuster of all times, a coming-of-age rom-com involving two love triangles set in different phases of life. Two best friends Anjali and Rahul are set apart, when a new girl named, Tina, enters Rahul's life. Years later, deceased Tina's daughter takes it upon herself to reunite the estranged lovers. But, Anjali is engaged to Aman. Who will Anjali choose now?

‚ñ∫Mohobbatein

Directors: Aditya Chopra
Starring: Shahrukh Khan, Amitabh Bachchan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

MOHABBATEIN is a battle between two men who have opposing beliefs. Raj Aryan (Shahrukh Khan) supports love and would go to any extent for it. Narayan Shankar (Amitabh Bachchan) heads India‚Äôs most prestigious educational institute, stands for fear and believes that love leads to pain and weakness. It is also the love stories of 3 young couples who realize what will finally triumph, love or fear.

‚ñ∫Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
Directors: Karan Johar
Starring: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Ranbir Kapoor, Anushka Sharma

In this romantic drama, a popular singer Ayan Senger (Ranbir Kapoor) recounts his turbulent relationship with Alizeh Khan (Anushka Sharma) during an interview based on the love of his life. He reminisces about their chance meeting in London, their troubled, unrequited love, his personal growth over the years and how this relationship shaped his destiny.

‚ñ∫Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
Directors: Aditya Chopra
Starring: Shah Rukh Khan, Anushka Sharma, Rani Mukerji

This is a story of Surinder Sahni (Shahrukh Khan) - a simple, clean hearted, honest man, leading a humdrum life, when he meets his total opposite and finds love in the flamboyant, fun-loving, vivacious - Taani (Anushka Sharma). What follows is a journey filled with laughter, tears, joy, pain, music, dance...that makes us believe that there is an extraordinary love story in every ordinary couple.

A successful writer, Abhimanyu Roy (Ayushmann Khurrana) returns to his roots to write an old-fashioned love story, 3 years in the making. This writer's block is called Bindu (Parineeti Chopra). How do you contain this live wire in the pages of a book? When Abhi stumbles across an old audio cassette of their favourite playlist, it sends him down memory lane and his novel starts writing itself.

description:
When Amitabh Bachchan comes to collect rent from Ayushmann Khurrana, he and his family set up a scenario to skip from paying rent again. But the microwave bell sabotages their plan. Watch Shoojit Sircar‚Äôs Gulabo Sitabo, only on Amazon Prime Video, starring Amitabh Bachchan, Ayushmann Khurrana, Vijay Raaz, Brijendra Kala & others, in association with Rising Sun Films and Kino Works.

‚ñ∫ Watch Now Gulabo Sitabo - https://bit.ly/GulaboSitabo 

Starring Amitabh Bachchan, Ayushmann Khurrana, Vijay Raaz, Brijendra Kala, and others.  

Directed by Shoojit Sircar 
Story screenplay & Dialogue by Juhi Chaturvedi
Produced by - Ronnie Lahiri & Sheel Kumar

About Gulabo Sitabo

Welcome to the World of Gulabo Sitabo where two slimy scheming foxes in a game of one upmanship, each one attracting other members to their clan and each one with an agenda of his own.

Meet ‚ÄòMirza‚Äô(Amitabh Bachchan) ‚Äì a 78yrs old landlord, who would move heaven and earth for his most priced possession ‚Äì an old Dilapidated Mansion in the heart of Lucknow

But this garden of roses comes with its own cluster of ‚Äòpricky thorns‚Äô ‚Äì tenants. Amongst them most prominently, ‚ÄòBaankey‚Äô (Ayushmann Khuranna)‚Äô a shrewd, sly and squatted tenant, who matches Mirza bit for bit in their ceaseless bantering. 

Gulabo Sitabo is a quirky slice of life where Mirza and Baankey are like Tom and Jerry - unique and unmatched, friend and foe, naughty and smart, little and large, all combine to produce chaos

Gulabo Sitabo, the dramedy, premieres on June 12, exclusively on Amazon Prime Video.

title: Chhalaang | Making of Care Ni Karda | Rajkummar R, Nushrratt B | YoYo Honey Singh, Alfaaz, Hommie D
description:
Bringing you all the fun, laughter and care that went behind the making of Chhalaang‚Äôs Care Ni Karda.

Chhalaang stars Rajkummar Rao & Nushrratt Bharuccha. The film is written by Luv Ranjan, Aseem Arrora & Zeishan Quadri, it is directed by Hansal Mehta, produced by Ajay Devgn, Luv Ranjan & Ankur Garg, and presented by Bhushan Kumar. 
Chhalaang is slated to release on Amazon Prime Video, this Diwali, Nov 13. 
Chhalaang is a hilarious, yet inspirational journey of a PT Master from a semi government funded school in Northern India. Montu (Rajkummar Rao) is a typical PT Master for whom it‚Äôs just a job. When circumstances put everything that Montu cares for at stake, including Neelu (Nushrratt Bharuccha) who he loves, Montu is forced to do what he has never done - Teach. Through Montu‚Äôs journey, Chhalaang humorously addresses the value of Sports Education in the school curriculum.

description:
Kaun Kitney Paani Mein is a 2015 Hindi drama film starring Saurabh Shukla, Kunal Kapoor, Radhika Apte and Gulshan Grover. Residents of Upri and Bairi village have been at loggerheads for generations. When the Upri village faces a drought, the village chief's son, Raj, decides to woo Bairi village's MLA's daughter, Paro, to get help for his village. What starts with a selfish intention then becomes a pure love story. Will the two villages accept the Raj and Paro's relationship.

Synopsis:
The film follows the escape of two people belonging to two different worlds within our society and the circumstances that brings them together.

Sandy Walia short for Sandeep Kaur Walia (Parineeti Chopra) is a 30 year old single, pregnant, senior banker working in a growing private sector bank now wanting to resign. Post her resignation, Sandeep and her boss decide to meet for a final 'goodbye' dinner at a high class lounge in Delhi. After waiting for a significant time, Sandy decides to leave with an old acquaintance for another party when she is secretly hauled by Pinky (Arjun Kapoor), short for Satinder Dahiya a 35 year old, divorced, suspended police officer who works with the Special Unit cell of the Delhi Police, into a car and driven off into the deserted roads of Gurgaon.

While the two drive away from the main city of Delhi, Pinky seems tense and is continuously talking to his boss over the phone who gives him directions to a barricade point. Amidst all the confusion, Pinky's intuition kicks in and he decides to give wrong information as a result of which both Sandy and Pinky watch a false car being attacked in front of their eyes, killing everyone inside.

From this moment onwards, Sandy and Pinky realise that they are marked for a kill and have to run to be alive. A deal is cracked between the two where they plan to cross the Indian border and escape to Nepal post which the two would go their own way.

Throughout their journey together, while they are continuously being chased by the 'big people' who want them dead, Sandy and Pinky reveal themselves in ways that affect each other and make them reflect on their lives in the past. The people they meet on this journey, both influence and are influenced by them. They bring them to a final internal realisation on what 'escaping' or 'freedom' actually means to them.

Synopsis:
India‚Äôs top agent Kabir (Hrithik Roshan) leads the Elite Shadow Unit of R&AW, a compact group of the cr√®me de la cr√®me of the armed forces who are personally trained by him and work with him on various high-risk missions across the world. Among Kabir and Colonel Luthra‚Äôs key targets are an international arms baron Rizwan Ilyasi who has been key in various acts of terrorism against the country.

Khalid (Tiger Shroff) has fought his way up the ranks of the Indian armed forces. His greatest challenge and battle has been to fight against the sins of his father, once a decorated soldier working with Kabir who had turned a traitor. His ambition has been to join Kabir‚Äôs team to remove any stains on their family name. Kabir is not keen due to their past history, but Colonel Luthra requests him to, and gradually Kabir is also impressed by Khalid‚Äôs intense dedication and grit. Khalid becomes Kabir‚Äôs greatest soldier ever, flirting with death repeatedly in mission after mission as they go after the country‚Äôs enemies, including a mission against Rizwan Ilyasi that nearly kills Khalid.

But Khalid‚Äôs greatest mission, his toughest yet, is still to come. When his own mentor Kabir turns rogue and starts to go after top officials and scientists and officers in the Indian establishment, targeting and executing them viciously across the world.

Colonel Luthra is unsure if Khalid has it in him to go after Kabir. Is he clever enough to hunt the man who trained him, and even if he does get him, does he have it in him to put a bullet in his hero‚Äôs head? Luthra advises Khalid against the mission but he insists - he is the best prot√©g√© and the only one who can track the mentor. And only Kabir can answer the crucial question - why did he turn rogue?

A vicious cat and mouse game ensues as prot√©g√© goes after mentor in a war that spills across the globe. As the chase unravels both Kabir and Khalid begin to finally realize, what desperate stakes really drive them in this terrifying war.

About YRF Spy Universe:
YRF Spy Universe is a first of its kind cinematic universe of spy thriller films in India. The first film in the universe, "Ek Tha Tiger," starring Salman Khan and Katrina Kaif was released in 2012, followed by its sequel "Tiger Zinda Hai" in 2017. The third film in the universe, "War," was released in 2019 and starred Hrithik Roshan and Tiger Shroff in pivotal roles. "Pathaan" was the fourth instalment in the Spy Universe franchise which released in January 2023 starring Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone and John Abraham. "Tiger 3" is the fifth instalment in the YRF Spy Universe and the third film in the Tiger franchise starring Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif and Emraan Hashmi, which released on Diwali (12th November 2023).

The YRF Spy Universe is now one of the biggest IP‚Äôs in the history of Indian cinema and all the films in this franchise have been blockbusters. 

YRF Spy Universe films boast of incredible visual spectacles with high-octane action sequences, thrilling plot-lines, power-packed characters and musical chartbusters.

Sunny looks like any other innocent 21-year old, but there‚Äôs more to him. He has a penchant for sexually assaulting and eventually murdering young girls. While at it, he locks horns with Shivani Shivaji Roy (Rani Mukerji), the newly appointed chief of the city police. Sunny‚Äôs fascinated by her persona. Meanwhile, Shivani is hounded by the media, led by the well-known reporter Amit Sharma about her role in instigating the serial killer to go a killing spree in city. On one hand the partial media and on the other hand... only a few hours left to hunt a serial killer who‚Äôs out to target more women. Synopsis:
India‚Äôs top agent Kabir (Hrithik Roshan) leads the Elite Shadow Unit of R&AW, a compact group of the cr√®me de la cr√®me of the armed forces who are personally trained by him and work with him on various high-risk missions across the world. Among Kabir and Colonel Luthra‚Äôs key targets are an international arms baron Rizwan Ilyasi who has been key in various acts of terrorism against the country.

Khalid (Tiger Shroff) has fought his way up the ranks of the Indian armed forces. His greatest challenge and battle has been to fight against the sins of his father, once a decorated soldier working with Kabir who had turned a traitor. His ambition has been to join Kabir‚Äôs team to remove any stains on their family name. Kabir is not keen due to their past history, but Colonel Luthra requests him to, and gradually Kabir is also impressed by Khalid‚Äôs intense dedication and grit. Khalid becomes Kabir‚Äôs greatest soldier ever, flirting with death repeatedly in mission after mission as they go after the country‚Äôs enemies, including a mission against Rizwan Ilyasi that nearly kills Khalid.

But Khalid‚Äôs greatest mission, his toughest yet, is still to come. When his own mentor Kabir turns rogue and starts to go after top officials and scientists and officers in the Indian establishment, targeting and executing them viciously across the world.

Colonel Luthra is unsure if Khalid has it in him to go after Kabir. Is he clever enough to hunt the man who trained him, and even if he does get him, does he have it in him to put a bullet in his hero‚Äôs head? Luthra advises Khalid against the mission but he insists ‚Äì he is the best prot√©g√© and the only one who can track the mentor. And only Kabir can answer the crucial question ‚Äì why did he turn rogue?

A vicious cat and mouse game ensues as prot√©g√© goes after mentor in a war that spills across the globe. As the chase unravels both Kabir and Khalid begin to finally realize, what desperate stakes really drive them in this terrifying war.

Synopsis:
When RV (Saif Ali Khan) is spotted by Harry (Jaaved Jaafery) the Manager of a failing Racing car team Speeding Saddles, everything changes for RV and the team... They shoot to the top.... the dream is complete when he meets Radhika (Rani Mukerji) and the 2 tie the knot... the world is at their feet.

But when he meets with an accident, his world is turned upside down, he not only loses the edge on the track but everything he had once gained, the accolades, the fans, the money, the house the friends and the glory.

It is now that his young family must help him fight his demons and get him back in the driving seat. The family struggles to survive a life that they are not used to - from a big house in a plush locality to the a run down apartment in the Bronx is not what RV wanted for his family - RV is on the road back but can he reclaim the glory for his family?

About YRF Spy Universe:
YRF Spy Universe is a first of its kind cinematic universe of spy thriller films in India. The first film in the universe, "Ek Tha Tiger," starring Salman Khan and Katrina Kaif was released in 2012, followed by its sequel "Tiger Zinda Hai" in 2017. The third film in the universe, "War," was released in 2019 and starred Hrithik Roshan and Tiger Shroff in pivotal roles. "Pathaan" was the fourth instalment in the Spy Universe franchise which released in January 2023 starring Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone and John Abraham. "Tiger 3" is the fifth instalment in the YRF Spy Universe and the third film in the Tiger franchise starring Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif and Emraan Hashmi, which released on Diwali (12th November 2023).

The YRF Spy Universe is now one of the biggest IP‚Äôs in the history of Indian cinema and all the films in this franchise have been blockbusters. 

YRF Spy Universe films boast of incredible visual spectacles with high-octane action sequences, thrilling plot-lines, power-packed characters and musical chartbusters.

Before they knew the world, they knew each other. Such was their bond, such was their friendship.

Each time they sought new beginnings, each time they would rise, the world would crush them down. So, they fought again... and again. Together they were unbeatable. They were unstoppable. They were inseparable.

In the years that passed, Bikram and Bala, became Calcutta's most loved, most celebrated, most reckless, most fearless and most powerful GUNDAY!

They had everything... then, one fine day, bells rang...

Nandita, the most beautiful cabaret dancer, walked into their lives, and they lost everything to her. Their murky world turned magical and colourful. They fell head over heels in love with her.

But that was only a blissful lull before an impending storm...

And then entered ACP Satyajeet Sarkar, the right for every wrong, a law for every outlaw and a counter force for Bikram and Bala.

What follows from here is the most sensational-most thrilling-most dramatic story ever told!

The trio think they are on the sets of a Bollywood movie, and take nothing seriously, until they are imprisoned. Now they must return to the 21st century along with the crown, to prove their innocence.

description:
When Nushrratt Bharuccha asks Rajkummar Rao about his ambitions, he tricks her by saying how he is driven by sports and felt bad for the students at school and hence became a PT Teacher.  

Watch the World Premiere of Chhalaang on 13th November 2020 only on Amazon Prime Video.

About Chhalaang
Chhalaang is a hilarious, yet inspirational journey of a PT Master from a semi government funded school in Northern India. Montu (Rajkummar Rao) is a typical PT Master for whom it‚Äôs just a job. When circumstances put everything that Montu cares for at stake, including Neelu (Nushrratt Bharuccha) who he loves, Montu is forced to do what he has never done - Teach. Through Montu‚Äôs journey, Chhalaang humorously addresses the value of Sports Education in school curriculum.

title: Inside Gauri Khan and Shah Rukh Khan's glamorous New Delhi home | Vogue India
description:
‚ÄúLove, joy, togetherness, and happiness, is the key for any family house and building a home together,‚Äù says Gauri Khan, as she takes us on a tour of her home and personal memories, on occasion of her unique collaboration with Airbnb.

For Gauri and Shah Rukh Khan both, their home in New Delhi is an emotional abode, surrounded with unusual pieces of art and artefacts, photographs, collectibles and everything that evokes nostalgia and captures the best moments of her family. Take a tour now.

Production: Yashna Chopra

LABEL: REAL
title: What's in my bag with Taapsee Pannu | S03E04 | Fashion | Bollywood | Pinkvilla
description:
Taapsee Pannu is a superb actress and is fabulously stylish. This hot and talented actress got us curious about what she carries in her bag. We caught up with Taapsee when she visited the Pinkvilla HQ and asked her to reveal it to us. From everyday essentials to some interesting items, Taapsee opened her bag for us. 

Taapsee worked as a software professional and also pursued a career in modelling before becoming an actress. During her modelling career, she appeared in a number of commercials. Taapsee made her acting debut with the 2010 Telugu film Jhummandi Naadam, directed by Raghavendra Rao. She gained popularity in Bollywood with her lead role in the movie Pink in 2016. She was seen in Baby (2015) and then played the lead role in Naam Shabana (2017), a prequel to Baby. Taapsee did Chashme Baddoor in 2013 with director David Dhawan. Her latest release is Judwaa 2, again directed by David Dhawan, where Taapsee shares screen space with Varun Dhawan and Jacqueline Fernandez.
